definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: The IAPP- IR cells distributed both in epithelium and in lamina propria during postnatal development.
sentences.chinese: IR細胞位於上皮細胞間及固有膜結締組織中。

sentences.english: Untreated, the condition damages the bones and connective tissue in the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 如果不治療，這種病會損害下巴的骨骼和結締組織。

sentences.english: Note the cells around papillations that have a myxoid connective tissue core.
sentences.chinese: 注意乳突狀結構周圍的細胞都有粘液樣結締組織核心。

sentences.english: Think of it as the connective tissue for HP's cloud.
sentences.chinese: 它就好比惠普雲中的結締組織。

sentences.english: Under this lies the dermis consisting of connective tissue.
sentences.chinese: 在這個謊言的真皮組成的結締組織。

sentences.english: The electron microscope observes the fragrant counterdie to divide into two, namely two-film and the knot contracts the organization membrane.
sentences.chinese: 電鏡觀察荃底膜分爲兩層，即雙膜和結締組織膜。

sentences.english: The argyrophil cells in the cecum mainly distribute in the connective tissue.
sentences.chinese: 在盲腸的嗜銀細胞主要分佈在結締組織內。

sentences.english: Microscopically, it is composed of delicate thin-walled vessels on a background of connective tissue stroma.
sentences.chinese: 顯微鏡下，表現爲結締組織間質內細小的薄壁血管。

sentences.english: Loose irregular connective tissue (also called areolar tissue) as seen underlying and supporting epithelium in an ordinary section.
sentences.chinese: 疏鬆結締組織分佈於上皮組織下方，其支持作用。

sentences.english: Note the dense pink connective tissue dura at the right.
sentences.chinese: 右邊是緻密的粉紅色結締組織硬腦膜。

sentences.english: Marfan's Syndrome is a genetic disorder that affects the connective tissue in the body.
sentences.chinese: 馬凡氏綜合症是基因型結締組織病。

sentences.english: Supporting this network is a deeper layer of connective tissue called stroma.
sentences.chinese: 支持這一系統的是一深層結締組織稱爲基質。

sentences.english: As the muscle is exercised, thicker connective tissue is required.
sentences.chinese: 鍛鍊的肌肉，需要要較厚的結締組織。

sentences.english: For me, following one soccer team has been the connective tissue of my life.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，迷上一個足球隊始終是我生命的結締組織。

sentences.english: Reinforces collagen fibres, firms support tissues and reshapes.
sentences.chinese: 強化膠原纖維及結締組織，營造麴線美。

sentences.english: This is due to a decrease in blood flow to the nail bed and an increase in connective tissue.
sentences.chinese: 這是由於在甲牀的血液流量減少，增加結締組織。

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
